title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details section has the following issues:
- Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
- The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top.
- The table does not have a label and cannot contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection is not allowed, although the move up/down action can be applied to more than one item.
- The signature preview is not displayed as a labeled wrap.
- The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB:
The marking between the button and the list should be reduced to an appropriate size. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
- The table should have a label so that it can contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection should be allowed, as the move up/down action can be applied to more than one item.
- The signature preview should be displayed as a labeled wrap.
- The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Navigate to the detail section.
3. Observe the marking between the button and the list.
4. Observe the alignment of the top button with the dialog top.
5. Check if the table has a label.
6. Attempt to select multiple items.
7. Verify the display of the signature preview.

Expected result:
- The marking between the button and the list should be of an appropriate size.
- The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
- The table should have a label to contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection should be allowed for the table items.
- The signature preview should be displayed as a labeled wrap.
- The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
